posts.post_title: FS: t206 Hall of Fame Collection – 36 cards - $old
posts.post_content:
Every t206 HOFer (minus 2 notable ones) in this lot.
1 pose per player.
30 raw and 6 slabbed – variety of backs

Asking $old

Shipping included 
Paypal f/f preferred
I’ll take it supersedes any negotiation.
I’m not interested in selling individually.
